Class ImageButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageButton
  • public class ImageButton
extends java.lang.Object
    Image Button class for 3D-2048 game Used for image buttons for 2048 game
    Version:
    Final-1.0 06.02.2019 2:00pm
    Author:
    Jiahua Chen

        x - x pos of button
        y - y pos of button
        w - width of button
        h - height of button
        image - not hovering image of button
        hover - hovering image of button

      • draw

        public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                 boolean hover)
        Draws the button, and automatically adjusts based on hovering or not
        Parameters:
        g - graphics object passed down from Screen
        hover - is the mouse hovering over the button or not

      • doesContain

        public boolean doesContain​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Checks if a MouseEvent is contained within the button
        Parameters:
        e - MouseEvent passed down from MouseListener
        Returns:
        true if mouse is in button, else false
